did.abstract: Minutes of meetings, reports, appeals, correspondence, financial records, leaflets, and flyers, relating to political and economic conditions in Siedlce province.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], NSZZ "Solidarność" (Labor organization) Region Mazowsze. Oddział w Siedlach miscellaneous records, [Box number], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1993.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Note
bioghist.p: This is one of Poland's NSZZ "Solidarnosc" (Independent Self-Governing Trade Union "Solidarity") local branches in the town and province of Siedlce, a unit of Solidarity's Mazovia Region. The Siedlce organization was founded in late 1980 and was legally tolerated by the Communist authorities until martial law was declared on December 13, 1981.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: The collection includes minutes of meetings, reports, appeals, correspondence, financial records, leaflets, and flyers, relating to political and economic conditions in Poland's Siedlce province. Also included are some internal Solidarity communications and general distribution materials from outside of the province, principally from Warsaw, as well a several underground Solidarity publications from 1982 to 1989.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is roughly arranged by physical form.

controlaccess.head: Indexing Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.
controlaccess.subject: Labor movement--Poland.
Labor unions--Poland.

did.unittitle: Miscellaneous publications, posters, leaflets, including some post-December 13, 1981. Includes Stanowisko w sprawie reformy spleczno-gospodarczej kraju (Gdansk, sierpien 1981), Materialy na pierwsze zebranie delegatow (Warszawa, Region Mazowsze, czerwiec 1981)
"Protokoly Zebran NSZZ 'S' Region Mazowsze. Oddzial Siedlce - 1981" - minutes of meetings through December 10, 1981
Receipts for subscriptions to periodicals; permits for displaying posters; miscellaneous Siedlce government and Solidarity publications
Receipts for telephone and telegraph payments
